text:
We’re hiring!

:card_index: *Marketing Automation Specialist, HubSpot + Salesforce > <https://www.coastalconsulting.co/about|Coastal Consulting>*
:round_pushpin: US + EST or CST Time Zone - Fully Remote
:moneybag: $60-90k
:information_source: We’re hiring a technical HubSpot expert with familiarity with the HubSpot Salesforce Integration. This team member will work on HubSpot workflows, advising on marketing automation strategy, integrating HubSpot and Salesforce, & more. Not a client-facing role.

<https://coastalconsulting.topgradingonline.com/job_openings/marketing-automation-specialist-HubSpot-salesforce?utm_campaign=direct_links&utm_medium=job-boards&utm_source=HubSpot-devs|Application/Job Description>
<https://www.coastalconsulting.co/about|About Us>

PS - Full-time employees only. We do not subcontract & are not looking for a contractor in this position. :slightly_smiling_face:
